trailingComments.value:
*
 * The `PostControls` utility constructs a list of buttons for a post which
 * perform actions on it.

leadingComments.value:
*
   * Get a list of controls for a post.
   *
   * @param {Post} post
   * @param {*} context The parent component under which the controls menu will
   *     be displayed.
   * @return {ItemList}
   * @public

*
   * Get controls for a post pertaining to the current user (e.g. report).
   *
   * @param {Post} post
   * @param {*} context The parent component under which the controls menu will
   *     be displayed.
   * @return {ItemList}
   * @protected

*
   * Get controls for a post pertaining to moderation (e.g. edit).
   *
   * @param {Post} post
   * @param {*} context The parent component under which the controls menu will
   *     be displayed.
   * @return {ItemList}
   * @protected

*
   * Get controls for a post that are destructive (e.g. delete).
   *
   * @param {Post} post
   * @param {*} context The parent component under which the controls menu will
   *     be displayed.
   * @return {ItemList}
   * @protected

*
   * Open the composer to edit a post.
   *
   * @return {Promise}

trailingComments.value: If this was the last post in the discussion, then we will assume that
the whole discussion was deleted too.

leadingComments.value: If there is a discussion list in the cache, remove this discussion.
If this was the last post in the discussion, then we will assume that
the whole discussion was deleted too.

 * The `PostControls` utility constructs a list of buttons for a post which

If this was the last post in the discussion, then we will assume that
the whole discussion was deleted too.
If there is a discussion list in the cache, remove this discussion.
